page.title: 13HOME LIFE
page.content: ON SATURDAY WHEN I WOKE UP AT EIGHT O' CLOCK I CAME DOWN STAIRS TO HAVE MY BREAKFAST. I HAD CORNFLAKES AND COFFEE. WHEN I FINISHED I WENT TO SIT DOWN BUT FIRST I TURNED THE T.V ON, TO WATCH THE PICTURE SHOW. THEN I WENT OUT SIDE ON MY BICYCIE. LATER I WATCHED GRANDSTAND,THEY HAD FOOTBALL AND SPEEDWAY RACING.THEN I HAD MY DINNER OF CHIPS, BACON AND SAUSAGE WITH SQUASH. WHEN WE HAD FINISHED THAT I WENT WITH MY DAD TO WORK AT OLD GWERYNFED AND WE TOPPED AND TAILED THE LAMBS. WHEN WE CAME BACK I TURNED THE T.V. ON. I WATCHED THE DUKES OF HAZARD, THEN DYNASTY AND I WENT TO BED AFTER A SUPPER OF COFFEE AND BISCUITS. I WAS LOOKING FORWARD TO A DAY OF TREKKING WITH MY BROTHER AND HIS CLIENTS ON THE NEXT DAY.
